Text: further my earlierOkay I am an idiot and forgot to give you Elizabeths contact info email phone she is looking forward to your call Kisses Pb

thank youDear Jeff So wonderful to see you yesterday and hear all your news I have mailed your business card to my friend the star lobbyist Vince Versage and I am sure he will be in touch You will really like him he is extremely smart extremely connected and most unusually in Washington seems to have NO enemies whatsoever I cant tell you how rare this is and how important for the clients On the other more important front please do give Elizabeth Danes nice name dont you think a call the next time youre in New York She is very cute very smart very fun She is currently a principal with Capital Z a unit of the Zurich and spends her life deciding which funds her fund of funds should back Very welltraveled lives in Tribeca you will really like her I can already see myself zipping around London in that adorable little convertible Kisses and maniest thanks again for breakfast Pb
